response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. This is an opportunity to secure a high-value asset at a competitive rate, tailored to meet your specific needs. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to potentially partnering with you.", "product_price": 14000}
